import React from "react"; import {Col, Row, FormGroup, Label, Button, ModalBody, ModalFooter, Input, Modal, ModalHeader,Form} from "reactstrap"; import { X, CheckSquare, FileText, } from "react-feather"; import Translate from "../../../Translate"; import jwt from "jwt-simple"; const UserModal = (props) => { function ModalBodyComponent(props) { if(props.type==="delete"){ return( Դուք համոզված ե՞ք ջնջել ) }else{ return(
{props.positions.map((item, key) => { return })}
) } } return ( props.toggleModal(props.type)} size="md"> props.toggleModal(props.type)}> ); }; export default UserModal;
